WorkItem.Description:
I want to derive the BackgroundWorker class in my control class to report progress to a form where i use the control.
 
For Example :
 
If I raise a Method in my control, the Progress will be Reported to the form by the ProgressChanged Event of my Control class.
 
Thanks!
WorkItem.Summary: C# BackgroundWorker - Derive new class to handle ProgressEvent from control.
